text: KRDR (105.7 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Alva, Oklahoma. The station is owned by Blue Sky Media, LLC. It airs a classic hits format. The station was assigned the KRDR call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on November 15, 2012. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * RDR (FM) Category:Radio stations established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in Oklahoma Category:Classic hits radio stations in the United States Category:Woods County, Oklahoma
title: KRDR (FM)
